channel.title: Banner Request :P
channel.description: Not sure if you can post forum banner requests here, but i figured i wold give it a shot. Anyways, will someone make me a banner that says.. "Partyhax" of course i want a party hat in the picture, and i want the main colors to be orange and black. THANKS!

item.title: Banner Request :P
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:

Bring up the blakeman1892 logo thread. Was the epitome of troll

item.title: Banner Request :P
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:17, topic:432854”][quote author=Cole1497 link=topic=535562.msg3916061#msg3916061 date=1329189356]

Enjoy.

Great work rep++, my suggestion would be to add some lens flare in the top left.

Brilliant suggestion!

If you’re going to fuck around, you need at least two penii.
Also, I’m working on a real banner so OP isn’t scared away from mscp.
[/quote]
Valid point. And the lens flare isn’t strong enough.
Also, while on this topic, this has to be one of the best I’ve seen on this site:

dc7nkn.png1598×961
[/quote]

Haha I love that one

Read full topic

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,111.0.html

btw you probably wont get a decent one from this community.

He probably would if he actually contributed to the community. Not if he just comes here for our ossim possim gfx skillz.
[/quote]
Don’t talk like that, and I wouldn’t recommend him to MITB, because people like speljohan just draw dicks and glitter everywhere. That part of the community isn’t to be taken seriously with requests.[/quote]
Fuckin lol’d, this is so true.
